alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:38AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Floyd, southeastern Walker, western Gordon, central Chattooga and northwestern Bartow Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 938 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Lake Marvin to Tidings to near Gaylesville, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Calhoun, Adairsville, Resaca, Plainville, Shannon, Pinson, Oostanaula, Subligna, Tidings, Redbud, Armuchee, Lake Marvin, Audubon, Coosa, Sugar Valley, Everett Springs, Holland and Lindale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
